text: Valeriya Belaya (born 4 July 1998) is a Belarusian footballer who plays as a midfielder and has appeared for the Belarus women's national team. ==Career== Belaya has been capped for the Belarus national team, appearing for the team during the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup qualifying cycle. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Belarusian women's footballers Category:Belarus women's international footballers Category:Women's association football midfielders Category:FC Minsk (women) players
title: Valeriya Belaya
